# inno-footer-item



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Overview

Represents an inno-footer item.

Wrap an element for the inno-footer parent.

See the InnoFooter docs for more information.

## Properties

| Property  | Attribute | Description                                                                                 | Type                | Default   |
| --------- | --------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ------------------- | --------- |
| `variant` | `variant` | Theme variant property. Inherited from the parent. Can be overridden if explicitly defined. | `"dark" \| "light"` | `'light'` |
